item.title: How to work on a hugo site usign github codespaces
item.author: Safta Catalin Mihai
item.description: My setup for working on this blog is to write on a tablet, not my main computer, so i can’t directly run the hugo server locally. I decided to use github codespacaces for editing the blog and run it as aa dev server so I can view the edited pages after making changes.
